TagsInheritancePolicy.description: DownTree - propagates all user groups assigned to categories for all their descendants. UpTree - propagates user groups up to hierarchy from descendants to parents
TagsInheritancePolicy.title: Selected policy for user groups propagation

CronExpression.description: Specify the cron expression to schedule synchronization tasks. For example: '0/x * * * *' for every x minutes, '0 */x * * *' for every x hours, '15 */x * * *' for specific minutes every x hours, or '0 0 */x * *' for every x days.
CronExpression.title: Cron expression for outline synchronization jobs (valid only with UpTree propagation policy).

LogTaggedItemsChanges.description: Enable logging of changes to user groups assigned to products and categories.
LogTaggedItemsChanges.title: Log user group changes

EventBasedIndexation.description: Enable event-based indexation for user groups. When enabled, user groups will be indexed automatically when changes occur.
EventBasedIndexation.title: Enable event-based indexation for user groups
